commentBody: Of all the major money and moral issues surrounding college football and basketball (including the NCAA promoting a sports system that you yourself have noted reeks of the plantation system, and some Big 5 conference teams that are equivalent to pro teams), you choose to write about the NAPS on the day of the Army-Navy game?  Say it ain't so, Joe!!  If the NAPS allows more men/women from underrepresented backgrounds who have talent into our US Navy Officer corps, so much the better!  Remember, Joe, that "equal" does not mean "fair".
